file_content.text: If you lease from the Hutt Cartel, you should always read the fine print....
The Imperials won't be manufacturing any more bioweapons in that lab.
What an astonishing coincidence. We were just about to revoke their lease....
Now if you'll excuse me, it's probably best if we're not seen together.
Wouldn't want anyone thinking you're on a Hutt's payroll, haha.
I haven't heard the sounds of smashing beakers or screaming Imperials yet....
The evidence you collected makes it clear the Imperials deliberately violated the terms of their agreement with us.
Destroy their main laboratory and we all benefit.
If I destroy their lab, it's for the protection of the galaxy, not because the Empire ripped you off in a deal.
I'm not doing it for you.
Of course, Master Jedi. Everyone knows you're too good to work with a Hutt. Here is the lab location.
I should know better than to listen to a Hutt, but your case is sound. The lab should be eliminated.
I hope I don't regret this.
Don't worry, Master Jedi. You can do this with a clean conscience. The lab location is right here.
That lab is a legitimate military target. You've got nothing to do with it.
Your benefit is irrelevant.
You say keelpuna, I say keepunah. Here's the location for the lab.
The Imperials must have paid you guys good credits to keep quiet about this one....
What's the price tag?
Don't worry. You'll get your share. Here is the lab's location.
I love destruction.
I'll give you the lab location.
As far as I'm concerned, anything moving inside is a target. Anything nailed down, shoot that too.
Then let me know when it's done, so I can send our former partners a message....
I'll pass. [Refuse quest]
Suit yourself. Someone's going to destroy that lab... I just thought you might enjoy it.
I have Betterlife's complete records here.
After a few false starts, from what I hear...? I trust you were discreet when disposing of their security guards?
You can hardly blame them for being surprised to face your strength and our expertise combined.
Let me show the generosity of my people.
I hope this is a sufficient price for your aid. And your silence.
You have my discretion.
Of course.
Then perhaps you would be willing to do one more small thing? One which would destroy the Empire's ability to produce bioweapons on Nar Shaddaa?
Add a few zeroes.
Perhaps I can offer you something even better, no? A chance to target the Empire's bioweapons development?
I don't take money from Hutts.
Then perhaps I can offer you something better. A chance to target the Empire's bioweapons development on Nar Shaddaa.
Those Imperials are very picky about their security. Don't try to enter their system until you have an access code.
Haha. I know Jedi are famed for upholding the law.
Haha. You Republic soldiers are simple to predict--uphold the law, no matter where or whose, right?
Haha. Your reputation proceeds you. Not so many scruples as the rest of these Republic tourists....
Perhaps for once, we can be on the same side...?
When the Empire abducts men off the streets for their experiments, it offends us all, no?
True.
Since when have Hutts cared about the well-being of people on their worlds?
You're taking a moral stance?
I said we have a mutual interest in stopping the Empire from profiting off them. Not that I'm shedding big weepy tears for their suffering.
What are you asking for?
Our research shows Betterlife Pharmaceuticals is a front company for an Imperial research group. They've been kidnapping people to experiment on them.
I'm guessing you'll want them to have freedom, happiness, all the synthfood they can eat.... We just want our share of the profits.
I'm not helping you earn credits off human misery!
Forget your profits!
What about ending that human misery?
If I step in, it will be purely to ease the suffering of the victims.
I don't care about profits.
Sure. You get what you want, we get what we want.
The Republic has a responsibility to defend the downtrodden.
My duty is to the victims.
So defend them. What do I care?
"Share..." That's an interesting word... just how much are you willing to share?
What kind of profits?
I can pay for your services.
What's the job?
You're disgusting.
The whole galaxy says that about Hutts. It stops no one from working with us.
All I need is evidence. If the Imperials are cheating us, I assure you we'll shut down their lab and return the victims to their miserable little lives.
If you can get inside the front company, you should be able to secure an access code to break into their system.
Small work for a group like you.
Small work for a Jedi.
Small work for a Republic soldier.
Small work for someone like you.
We can cooperate. Once. Don't expect it to happen again.
Fine. I'll do it.
If you're lying, you're dead.
Back off. The job's legit.
Once you get an access code off of one of their scientists, you'll need to use the information terminal in the lab.
It will provide instructions on how to send a complete memory dump straight to this datapad. Best of luck.
Forget it. [Refuse quest]
Suit yourself. Those poor people will be sorry to hear their lives weren't worth saving....
So many visitors to our little world....
